name: The Devil And I
description:
Where death is not the end, fulfill your path "by any character necessary" 

on death, you will be alternating between the character you "control" to complete your goal.

- To be played in full screen (or funny things will show up xD)

- i really really appreciate all comments, notes, suggestions and advices. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

A short game made for the #SaudiGN gamejam.  #SaudiGJ

- and my first game ever :D -

ســنــسيرلي , عماد
